Title: An Act Establishing a Municipal Hospital in the Municipality of Inabanga, Province of Bohol, to be Known as the Dagohoy Municipal Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 316
An Act Establishing a Municipal Hospital in the Municipality of Inabanga, Province of Bohol, to be Known as the Dagohoy Municipal Hospital
Section 1. There shall be established under the direct supervision of the Office of the Minister (Ministry of Health), a municipal hospital in the Municipality of Inabanga, Province of Bohol, to be known as the Dagohoy Municipal Hospital.
Section 2. The amount needed for the operation of the hospital shall be determined in accordance with Section 40 of Presidential Decree No. 1177 and charged to the appropriations authorized by Batas Pambansa Blg. 131 for the Ministry of Health intended for new hospitals.1awp++i1 Thereafter such sums as may be necessary for its operation and maintenance shall be included in the annual General Appropriations Act. The Minister of Health shall determine the manner by which said hospital shall be made operational.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: November 14, 1982
